TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MsmqTransportBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.MsmqBindingElementBase
Public NotInheritable Class MsmqTransportBindingElement Inherits MsmqBindingElementBase

summary.span: 表示用來為 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務指定佇列通訊屬性的繫結項目 (該服務會使用原生 Message Queuing (MSMQ) 通訊協定)。

span.span: Represents the binding element used to specify the queuing communication properties for a Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service that uses the native Message Queuing (MSMQ) protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓使用者設定佇列通訊通道的屬性。The enables the user to set the properties of the queued communication channel. 佇列通訊通道的傳輸中會使用訊息佇列。The queued communication channel uses Message Queuing for its transport. 這個繫結項目是訊息佇列標準繫結 () 所使用的預設繫結項目。This binding element is the default binding element used by the Message Queuing standard binding (). ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/service.cs#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public MsmqTransportBindingElement ();
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed
Public Sub New ()
public: MsmqTransportBindingElement();

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory<TChannel> BuildChannelFactory<TChannel> (System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context);

.method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelFactory`1<!!TChannel> BuildChannelFactory<TChannel>(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) cil managed
Public Overrides Function BuildChannelFactory(Of TChannel) (context As BindingContext) As IChannelFactory(Of TChannel)

span.span: A or a class.

param.name: context
param.span: 用來建置通道處理站的 。

span.span: The with which to build the channel factory.

summary.span: 使用提供的內容建置通道處理站。

span.span: Builds a channel factory using the context provided.

returns.span: 可用來建立通道的訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 通道處理站，以便將訊息傳送到現有的訊息佇列應用程式。

span.span: A Message Queuing (MSMQ) channel factory that can be used to create channels to send messages to existing Message Queuing applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會建立通道處理站，而且會使用繫結項目中已設定的屬性來加以初始化。A channel factory is created and initialized using the properties that have been set in the binding element. 然後會使用初始化的通道處理站來建立輸出通道，這些通道可用來將訊息傳送到訊息佇列。The initialized channel factory is then used to create output channels that can be used to send messages to a message queue. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#7)]

span.span: The context value is null.

exception.span: TChannel 不是 IOutputChannel 或 IOutputSessionChannel。

span.span: The TChannel is not IOutputChannel or IOutputSessionChannel.

exception.span: MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel 為 EncryptAndSign 而且 UseActiveDirectory 為 false。

span.span: MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel is EncryptAndSign and UseActiveDirectory is false.

MemberSignature.Value: public override System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannelListener<TChannel> BuildChannelListener<TChannel> (System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) where TChannel : class, System.ServiceModel.Channels.IChannel;

The context value is null.

exception.span: TChannel 不是 IInputChannel 或 IInputSessionChannel。

span.span: The TChannel is not IInputChannel or IInputSessionChannel.

exception.span: MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqAuthenticationMode 為 Certificate，或者 WindowsDomain 和 MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel 為 None。

span.span: MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqAuthenticationMode is Certificate or WindowsDomain and MsmqTransportSecurity.MsmqProtectionLevel is None.

MemberSignature.Value: public int MaxPoolSize { get; set; }
.property instance int32 MaxPoolSize
Public Property MaxPoolSize As Integer
public: property int MaxPoolSize { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定整數，這個整數會指定包含內部訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 訊息物件之集區大小的上限。

span.span: Gets or sets an integer that specifies the maximum size of the pool that contains internal Message Queuing (MSMQ) message objects.

value.span: 指定包含內部訊息佇列訊息物件之集區大小上限的整數。

span.span: An integer that specifies the maximum size of the pool that contains internal Message Queuing message objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 內部訊息佇列訊息物件集區是用來在收送訊息時避免這些物件的配置。The internal Message Queuing message object pool is used to avoid allocations of these objects when sending and receiving messages. 集區大小的上限是效能調整參數。The maximum pool size is a performance-tuning parameter. 預設值為 8。The default value is 8. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#2)]

span.span: The value is less than zero.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol QueueTransferProtocol { get; set; }
.property instance valuetype System.ServiceModel.QueueTransferProtocol QueueTransferProtocol
Public Property QueueTransferProtocol As QueueTransferProtocol
public: property System::ServiceModel::QueueTransferProtocol QueueTransferProtocol { System::ServiceModel::QueueTransferProtocol get(); void set(System::ServiceModel::QueueTransferProtocol value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定列舉值，這個值表示此繫結所使用的佇列通訊通道傳輸。

span.span: Gets or sets an enumeration value that indicates the queued communication channel transport that this binding uses.

value.span: 列舉值，這個值表示在佇列管理員之間用於訊息傳遞的傳輸。

span.span: A enumeration value that indicates the transport used for message delivery between queue managers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 在使用 SOAP Reliable Messaging Protocol (SRMP) 時不支援 Active Directory 定址，所以當 設定為 時，請勿將 設定為 或 `true`。Message Queuing (MSMQ) does not support Active Directory addressing when using SOAP Reliable Messaging Protocol (SRMP), so do not set to or when is set to `true`. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#3)]

exception.span: 該值不是其中一個 值。

span.span: The value is not one of the values.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string Scheme { get; }
.property instance string Scheme
Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Scheme As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ Scheme { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 傳回 ，其中包含這個傳輸繫結項目所使用的定址配置。

span.span: Returns a that contains the addressing scheme that is used by this transport binding element.

value.span: ，其中包含這個傳輸繫結項目所使用的定址配置。

span.span: A that contains the addressing scheme that is used by this transport binding element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回 "net.msmq" 這個字串。The property returns the string "net.msmq". 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 佇列傳輸支援數個定址配置，包括 net.msmq。The Message Queuing (MSMQ) queued transport supports several addressing schemes, including net.msmq. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool UseActiveDirectory { get; set; }
.property instance bool UseActiveDirectory
Public Property UseActiveDirectory As Boolean
public: property bool UseActiveDirectory { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 傳回布林值，這個值會指出是否應該使用 Active Directory 來轉換佇列位址。

span.span: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory.

value.span: 如果應該使用 Active Directory 來轉換佇列位址，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if queue addresses should be converted using Active Directory; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 佇列位址可以由路徑名稱或直接格式名稱所組成。Message Queuing (MSMQ) queue addresses can consist of path names or direct format names. 如為直接格式名稱，MSMQ 會使用 DNS、NetBIOS 或 IP 解析佇列名稱。With a direct format name, MSMQ resolves the queue name using DNS, NetBIOS, or IP. 如為路徑名稱，MSMQ 會使用 Active Directory 解析佇列名稱。With a path name, MSMQ resolves the queue name using Active Directory. 根據預設，Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 佇列傳輸會將轉換成直接格式名稱的訊息佇列的 URI。By default, the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) queued transport converts the URI of a message queue to a direct format name. 藉由將 屬性設定為 `true`，應用程式可以指定佇列傳輸應使用 Active Directory 來解析電腦名稱，而非使用 DNS、NetBIOS 或 IP 來解析。By setting the property to `true`, an application can specify that the queued transport should resolve the computer name using Active Directory rather than DNS, NetBIOS, or IP. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UE_ImperativeNetMsmq#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ue_imperativenetmsmq/cs/snippets.cs#5)]
